    Sponsor NSCamp

    Costs for food, beverages and possibly internet can mount up, so we're offering sponsorship opportunities for NSCamp. This is so we can keep the cost of attending NSCamp at a reasonable level.

    If your business is interested in sponsoring, there are a couple of different levels

    Beer sponsorship

    • Coding is hard, so lets have a drink
    • We'll buy the beer from a good local brewery
    • What you'll get. Your company name and logo will be next to the beer bar "Beer sponsored by awesome company", and people will think you're awesome
    • How much... $2,500

    Food sponsorship

    • Coding is makes me hungry, and the food sponsorship will help
    • The money goes to buying food, and paying catering to cook it for us.
    • What you'll get. Your company name and logo will be next to kitchen "Food sponsored by awesome company", and people will think you're great

    Internet sponsorship

    • There is code a library on the internet that you might need during the weekend
    • We spent it on some 3g/4g dongles, or if the camp has board-band the sponsorship will go towards that.
    • What you'll get. Your company name and logo will be on the internet in the hall where "Internet tubes sponsored by awesome company", and people will thank you providing them access to animated gifs

    Coffee sponsorship

    • We don't know of any developers that done like a coffee before coding
    • We spent your sponsorship dollars on some good beans and hire a proper coffee machine. We nay also hire a barista, incase there aren't enough developers who fancy themselves as baristas
    • What you'll get. Your company name and logo will be beside the coffee machine "Coffee sponsored by awesome company", plus people be grateful, as you saved them from a weekend without coffee. (just imagine that for a moment)
